## IPFSHttpClientUploader.getRequestOptions() method

Add additional arguments needed as part of the POST fetch request.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getRequestOptions(dataContent: FormData, meta?: FormDataPostHeaders): Promise<FormDataRequestOptions>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
